Detailed Description

template<typename TStruct, std::size_t I>
struct hope::detail::any_convertible< TStruct, I >

The only one reason of existing of this class is initialization of object of different types. This is the same as ubiq from magic-get
Template Parameters:
TStruct Type to be converted to
I Index, is used to unambiguously define the type
